name: The Cave of Infinity
description:
Description:

 A warrior is trapped in the cave of infinity. You will be fighting "yourself in the past" until you die.

Development Background: 

This is a game made for JimJam2, but I miscalculated the  time differences  and  was 1 minute late to the submission :(

Theme: 

The theme of the jam is Ouroboros.  The way I implemented it is, the player will choose a weapon before fighting in each level, and your enemy will be yourself with the weapon you chose in the last level.
